name: Display Category Image For WooCommerce
author: Rajdip Sinha Roy

sections.description:
Display Category Image on Product Category Archives.
When listing WooCommerce Product Categories, you need to show an image for each category header.
Category Archive Page Upload Image Field.

Suggestions

The plugin does not change any core files or database.

If you’re facing any issues:-
Deactivate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English

If you can’t find this plugin in your language and want to translate it, use the dedicated tool at [Translating WordPress] (https://translate.wordpress.org/locale/it/default/wp-plugins/display-category-image “Translating WordPress”).

Or, if you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send it as an email attachment at rajdipsinharoy@yahoo.in.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. That’s All. This plugin works automatically so don’t need to configure anything.

Now you need to set category Image from ‘/Products/Categories/your-choosed-category’ EDIT and set Thumbnail Image.
sections.faq:
Does this work for WordPress < 5.0 ?

If you are using a version before 5.0, It’ll work but recommended to use latest WordPress and WooCommerce.

Does this work only in the WooCommerce ?

Yes, this only works with WooCommerce.
